description: This Kotlin source file defines a singleton object SampleRepository that serves as an in-memory data repository for media items categorized into Action, Drama, and Sci-Fi genres. It provides methods to retrieve all categories, find items by ID, and perform simple search filtering across titles and overviews.

classes.name: Category
classes.description: A data class representing a media category with a name and list of media items.

classes.name: MediaItem
classes.description: A data class representing a media item with various attributes like id, title, overview, category, poster and backdrop resources, year, and rating.

methods.name: categories
methods.description: Returns all categories with their items.

methods.name: byId
methods.description: Finds a media item by its unique ID.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Performs a case-insensitive search across titles and overviews of media items.
